check_grant_implicitnotused: Grant type 'Implicit Grant' should not be used.
check_grant_refreshnotused: Grant type 'Refresh Token Grant' should not be used, other than for application type 'Native' i.e. mobile applications.
check_apptype_webapphasauthcode: Application type 'Regular Web Application' should use grant type 'Authorization Code Grant'.
check_apptype_m2mhasclientcred: Application type 'Machine to Machine' should use grant type 'Client Credentials Grant'.
check_apptype_thirdpartynotusepassword: Application type 'Third-Party Application' MUST not use the grant type 'Resource Owner Password Grant'.
check_oidcconformant: Application should be 'OIDC Conformant' as a more secure authentication protocol over SAML or WS-Fed.
check_apptype_genericnotused: Application type 'Generic' should be changed to a specific application type i.e. Web-App, SPA, M2M, Native
